basics.name: David Marshall
basics.label: Staff Engineer
basics.summary: Professional full-stack engineer, specializing in Ruby on Rails applications for e-commerce, payments, and fintech

work.name: AboveLending
work.summary: Revitalized a dormant integration test suite, coordinating ownership among Originations and Servicing engineering teams. Enhanced system observability through distributed tracing, automated Slack notifications for feature flag modifications, and meticulous launch plans for the phased introduction of new features.
highlights: Modernized an abandoned integration test suite
Overhauled system observability with distributed tracing
Automated slack messages for feature flag changes

work.name: Chime Financial
work.position: Staff Software Engineer, Risk and Identity
work.summary: Pioneered a distributed decision platform capable of real-time authorization, managing 300 queries per second with 12ms p95 latency. Implemented a no-code policy generator GUI. Spearheaded a 12-member engineering team, achieving $30M in risk loss reduction over 12 months.
highlights: Architect for a distributed decision platform
Integrated machine learning models to reduce account takeover rates by 85%

work.name: Groupon
work.summary: Boomerang hire. Slashed fraud losses by 90% through development of full-stack consumer-facing features and internal tools. Orchestrated risk service migrations between data centers without downtime. Conducted project management training for engineering teams.
highlights: Reduced fraud loss by 90% over 3 years
Led project management training for engineers
Migrated risk services between data centers with zero downtime

work.name: LendingHome
work.summary: Engaged in core engineering activities within the Product Engineering team.

work.name: Groupon
work.summary: First hire for Risk engineering team, lead team processes and standards as we grew to six engineers.

work.name: ModCloth
work.summary: Contributed to various software engineering projects as an Associate Software Engineer.
